answers.answer: Does diabetes run in his family? Diabetes can be caused by consuming to much fat or sugar.  With all the fast food and high fat content, there are a lot of young people developing diabetes.  There was also a study done that showed if kids go longer than 2 hours without something to drink or eat (other than water), they have a higher risk for diabetes.  He needs the plavix, aspirin and lipitor to prevent blood clots and help with cholesterol. Without these heart medications, he could have a dangerous blood clot causing a heart attack or continued blockage in the arteries.  We have many people in our family who have been on heart medication for a good share of their lives (I would say close to 100 family members).  Only one had developed diabetes and it was mild.  I would have to say that the heart medication helped them live a longer life with the oldest living to be 80.  My uncle, who did not know that he had heart disease, died suddenly at the age of 31 from severe coronary artery disease.  He never knew he had it.  The heart medications are what help people to live a long life.
